participant_1.background:
I don't talk to my family anymore.
i like cosplay.
i love cabins in the woods on the lake.
i go to craft shows on the weekends.
I like listening to folk metal and riding my boat.

participant_2.background:
I fear that I will lose my pets, because they are the only ones who truly understand me.
that way , after graduating , i can teach english there for a year or two.
I get along with my family well.
i still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
My spouse is a doctor who works long hours, but they always make time for me and our dog.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
Usually go to the park, play with my dog, and visit my parents.
I wish I could talk to my family still. I'm not really close to them.
I get along with my family really well. I'm sorry you don't.
It's OK. I found my family in my friends.
That's good! I'm glad you found people who love you.
I'm still learning to love myself, but I'm getting there.
You're perfect just the way you are.
Thank you. I'm not sure I believe you, but I'll try to believe it.
You should! You're a great person.
Thanks! I'm trying to be a better person.
